Frédéric Chopin

Andante spianato et Grande Polonaise brillante, op. 22

1831 (polonaise), 1834 (andante) · Chomiński 149 · Brown 58 (polonaise), 88 (andante)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 13'

  • 1. Andante spianato
  • 2. Grande Polonaise brillante

The Grande Polonaise brillante is written for piano and orchestra. It is often performed, though, by solo piano, with an unchanged solo part and straightforward arrangements of the short orchestral passages.

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 631 · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • National Edition · 16 (A XIVb) · ed. Jan Ekier
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50266 · ed. Christian Ubber

1. Andante spianato

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Grande Polonaise brillante

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 5
